page.title: 07RELIGION
page.content: Eastern Braintree contains churches of several denominations. The churches of England in represented by St Pauls in Hay Lane. There is also a Jehovah's Witness meeting room and a branch of the Elim church. Braintree also has a Catholic Franciscan Convent. There are only two Franciscan Convents in England and both of them are in Essex. The Convent is housed in very old beautiful buildings which were once owned by the Courtauld Family. It has magnificent grounds with a pond and a river running through. There are 17 nuns and they look after 70 old people. One nun has been there for 6o years. There is a very special weather vane at the convent which was made in 1780.
